name: CSR Outsourcing
longDescription: Let us handle your Corporate Social Responsibility initiatives. We provide complete, 360-degree solutions to manage and execute your CSR impact effectively.

featuresList.title: Impact Program Design & Execution
featuresList.description: We design, implement, and manage customized CSR programs focused on entrepreneurship, skill development, and community resilience that seamlessly align with your company's ESG goals (Environmental, Social, and Governance).

featuresList.title: Youth & Women Empowerment Focus
featuresList.description: We facilitate the direct channeling of CSR funds into ABB's pre-vetted portfolio of youth and women-led businesses, providing immediate, measurable impact in alignment with your public image.

featuresList.title: Impact Reporting & Accountability
featuresList.description: We provide audited, detailed reports and media documentation to ensure full accountability. This allows your company to report on quantifiable social outcomes without managing the operational complexity
